scripts.kraken: docker rm --force ghost-testing; npm run kraken-compile && npx ts-node shared/krakenRunner.ts
scripts.test-pw-regular: docker rm --force ghost-testing; npx playwright test --project=chromium --workers 1
scripts.test-pw-regular-windows: docker rm --force ghost-testing & npx playwright test --project=chromium --workers 1
scripts.execute-vrt-kraken-oldest: CI=1 GHOST_VRT=1 GHOST_VERSION=4.5 npm run kraken
scripts.execute-vrt-kraken-latest: CI=1 GHOST_VRT=1 GHOST_VERSION=5.96.0 npm run kraken
scripts.execute-vrt-kraken: npm run execute-vrt-kraken-oldest; npm run execute-vrt-kraken-latest; npm run vrt-resemble
